context: Hotel chain evaluating green certification program to meet growing customer demand for sustainable travel

request.purpose: Green building certifications, energy-efficient upgrades, and sustainable sourcing program
request.justification: Customer demand for sustainable options, regulatory pressure, cost savings potential

decision_process.outcome: Identified LEED certification pathway with 20% energy savings potential
Strong internal support with 75% employee approval
3-year payback with utility cost savings and premium pricing

business_impact.expected_outcome: LEED certification for all properties, 25% reduction in energy costs, 10% increase in premium bookings
long_term_benefits: Enhanced brand reputation as sustainability leader
Regulatory compliance advantage in green markets

lessons_learned: Sustainability initiatives require comprehensive stakeholder communication and clear ROI demonstration
